name: A Hallowed Tale
description:
A vertical slice of a story I conceived in 2010. A Hallowed Tale was developed over a year for my senior thesis in college and completed for my graduation in early 2015. Before releasing it here I fixed a number of glitches and added a few visual flares that were always intended, but weren't originally included for the sake of time.

The story and characters are something I still hold dear, and I learned an incredible amount trying to bring a small part of it to life. It's rather simple and there's a lot to be desired design wise, but It's a stepping stone to what I hope are more polished personal projects in the future.

It should work with most gamepads, but you can also play with a keyboard using Z , X , C , left CTRL, and the arrow keys if need be. (Tap up to talk)

The music was done by my friend Levi Davis.
